alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 21 at 4:25PM CDT until September 21 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR EASTERN FRONTIER COUNTY... At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Stockville, or 14 miles east of Curtis, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Moorefield, Stockville, Orafino, and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
